response.job_title: Sustainable mobility | Urban design | Climate change| Public transport
response.summary: I am a Civil Engineer with Master Studies in Urban Design and Urban Management and Development with a focus on land and water management in the context of climate change. Over 9 years of experience in the public and private sectors in road safety, sustainable mobility, governance and Public-Private Partnerships.
response.skills: Aptitudes para la coordinación, Sustainable Transport, Quality Assurance, Transportation Planning, Team Management, Cycling, Data Analysis, Business Analysis, Legal Document Preparation, Diseño urbano, Planificación de transportes, Sistemas de Información Geográfica, Urban sustainability, ArcGIS, Adobe Illustrator, Gestión, Inglés, Planeamiento de proyectos, Urban complex systems, Sustainable Development

profile_positions.title: City-wide on-street parking program manager for Bogotá

profile_positions.description: I coordinated the technical structuring of bidding processes needed for increasing the capacity of sub-national authorities throughout Colombia to improve road safety and enforce traffic regulations related to road safety. The result of these included the advisory for public-sector capacity building and also the acquisition of technical equipment.
profile_positions.title: Consultant in the design of projects about road safety

profile_positions.description: I served as technical advisor in the due dilligence of a Public-Private Partnership feasibility studies for a Bikeshare System of 3000 units for Bogotá, but also led the office’s own technical, financial and legal studies for said system, including the financial modelling and the bidding documents. The system started operations in September 2022. Furthermore, I supervised the feasibility studies for a wayfinding system for cyclists including a web-based journey planner, maps and new informative transit signs.
profile_positions.title: Senior consultant in the promotion of cycling

profile_positions.description: I led the technical team in charge of developing studies for the improvement of the operation of 100+ public transport services in Bogotá and optimised the analysis of primary and secondary information about public transport services. Additional to this, I headed the quality assurance of the studies about public transport planning.
profile_positions.title: Consultant in planning and quality

profile_positions.description:
Collected and analysed primary information for demand forecasting and incomes estimation in road infrastructure projects at different stages
I developed a spatial analysis to identify the main pedestrian corridors alongside a group of stations of the First Line of Metro of Bogotá and built a proposal for improving the stations of the Transmilenio system for a Public-Private Partnership feasibility study. Additional to this, I identified early opportunities for investment in Public-Private-Partnerships for road infrastructure in Colombia.
profile_positions.title: Consultant

profile_positions.description: I wrote reports, collected, and analysed primary information for demand forecasting and income estimation in road infrastructure projects at different stages, but also for the design of strategies for promoting cycling and for managing the transportation demand of urban projects.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Consultant

profile_positions.description: I wrote reports, developed spatial analyses and assisted in the management of two projects that were part of the design of the first regional tram for the Bogotá Metropolitan Area.
profile_positions.title: Internship Trainee

company.name: Secretaría Distrital de Movilidad
company.description:
La Secretaría Distrital de Movilidad es un organismo del Sector Central con autonomía administrativa y financiera, que tiene por objeto orientar y liderar la formulación de las políticas del sistema de movilidad para atender los requerimientos de desplazamiento de pasajeros y de carga en la zona urbana, tanto vehicular como peatonal, y de su expansión en el área rural del Distrito Capital en el marco de la interconexión del Distrito Capital con la red de ciudades de la región central, con el país y con el exterior. 

Misión
La Secretaría Distrital de Movilidad busca hacer de Bogotá una ciudad que promueva la felicidad y la calidad de vida de sus habitantes y visitantes en términos de movilidad, que potencia el desarrollo y la competitividad de la ciudad, protegiendo la vida y derechos de manera incluyente, con una gestión ética y transparente.

Visión
A 2038 la Secretaría Distrital de Movilidad será un referente mundial en movilidad sostenible, cultura ciudadana, generando credibilidad y confianza para Bogotá y su región, mediante innovación, creatividad, un equipo humano comprometido y competente, y un sistema de transporte multimodal que salvaguarda la vida en las vías.
